description:
We had a singing competition coming up so i was spending a lot of time practicing my solo, but then I suddenly lost my voice! Sakura came rushing to hel me but she was too late... Still, I`m so glad she`s my friend! We found ou tthe Voice card had stolen my voice. Sakura was really upset, which made me sad, but I knew she could capture it and get my voice back. Xiaolang had a great idea to lure the Voice card out, and it worked! Sakura captured it and got my voice back just like I knew she would.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakura to Kieta Tomoyo no Koe
ซากุระกับเสียงที่หายไปของโทโมโยะ
さくらと消えた知世の声
